articles.description: OnePlus has started rolling out the April 2022 security patches to the OnePlus 7, OnePlus 7 Pro, OnePlus 7T, OnePlus 7T Pro, and the Nord N100.
articles.content: After rolling out the April 2022 security patches to the OnePlus 9 series and OnePlus Nord 2 last week, OnePlus is now rolling out a similar update for the OnePlus 7 series, OnePlus 7T series, and th… [+1721 chars]
